name: Goviado Blue Robusto
additionalNotes: A new blend from GDW, makers of Reserva MiraFlor.  It's a Nicaraguan puro like the RMF, but the Connecticut wrapper makes it more mild and creamy.  Released by GDW in February 2009, it's available at some B&Ms and through Andres Madera. You can contact Andy at GDWcigars@gmail.com
